Unknown.translation: Just as wood is strengthened by drenching it in water for long and then its relation with water by which a faith develops that water will not sink the wood since it has brought it, up; ships are made with it that sail across the sea.

Unknown.translation: The fragrance of sandalwood of Malay mountain causes happiness. The woods and plants that have been touched by that fragrant breeze also acquire the fragrance of sandalwood.

Unknown.translation: The same wood reduces houses to ashes when it unites with fire. It also consumes friends, enemies and the whole world.
